milestones.description: Viv Richards has scored 10 hundreds in ODIs, the most for WI breaking Greenidge's record
Viv Richards has broken the record for most sixes in an innings (7) in ODIs for WI, going past Greenidge's 5
de Mel has conceded the most runs in an innings (97) in ODIs for SL, going past Ranasinghe's record of 78
Viv Richards has scored 10 hundreds in ODIs, breaking Greenidge's record
West Indies's 360 is the highest total in ODIs, surpassing Pakistan's 338
Viv Richards has broken the record for most sixes in an innings (7) in ODIs, going past Lance Cairns's 6

stories.title: From 334 to 481: the rise of the highest ODI total
stories.subTitle: England v Australia, 3rd ODI, Trent Bridge
stories.seoTitle: From 334 to 481: the rise of the highest ODI total
stories.summary: In every decade since the 1970s, teams have set new records for ODI totals, breaching the 300-run and then the 400-run mark.

image.caption: England's record total displayed on the Trent Bridge scoreboard
image.longCaption: England's record total displayed on the Trent Bridge scoreboard, England v Australia, 3rd ODI, Trent Bridge, June 19, 2018

stories.title: King Viv flays the Sri Lankans
stories.subTitle: Classic World Cup Moments
stories.seoTitle: Classic World Cup Moments: Viv Richards smashes 181 against Sri Lanka in the 1987 World Cup
stories.summary: It was just Sri Lanka's bad luck that they ran into a West Indies side smarting from a loss to England, and Viv Richards at his vintage best

image.caption: Viv Richards in his pomp
image.longCaption: Viv Richards in his pomp, West Indies v England, 1986

videos.title: Richards flays Sri Lanka
videos.summary: Viv Richards made a mockery of the Sri Lankan attack to notch up the highest individual score in World Cups at the time
